trans-unit.source: Represents a CDATA section.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma secção CDATA.

trans-unit.source: CDATA sections are used to quote or escape blocks of text to keep that text from being interpreted as markup language.
trans-unit.target: Secções CDATA são utilizadas para cotação ou blocos de texto para impedir que esse texto a ser interpretado como linguagem de marcação de escape.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlCDataSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XmlCDataSection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> that contains character data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>que contém dados de carateres.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>objeto.

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: Cria um duplicado deste nó.

trans-unit.source: `CloneNode` serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: `CloneNode`funciona como um construtor de cópia para nós.

trans-unit.source: To see how this method behaves with other node types, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A> method in the `XmlNode` class.
trans-unit.target: Para ver como este método se comporta com outros tipos de nó, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A>método o `XmlNode` classe</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cloned node has no parent (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`).
trans-unit.target: O nó clonado não tem um principal (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> devolve `null`).</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para recursivamente clonar subárvore sob o nó especificado; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para clonar apenas o próprio nó.

trans-unit.source: Because CDATA nodes do not have children, regardless of the parameter setting, the cloned node will always include the data content.
trans-unit.target: Porque o nós CDATA não tem elementos subordinados, independentemente da definição do parâmetro, o nó clonado incluirá sempre o conteúdo de dados.

trans-unit.source: The cloned node.
trans-unit.target: O nó clonado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the local name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do local do nó.

trans-unit.source: For CDATA nodes, the local name is <xref uid="langword_csharp_#cdata-section" name="#cdata-section" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para nós CDATA, o nome local é <xref uid="langword_csharp_#cdata-section" name="#cdata-section" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome qualificado do nó.

trans-unit.source: For CDATA nodes, the name is <xref uid="langword_csharp_#cdata-section" name="#cdata-section" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para nós CDATA, o nome é <xref uid="langword_csharp_#cdata-section" name="#cdata-section" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de nó atual.

trans-unit.source: The node type.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de nó.

trans-unit.source: For CDATA nodes, the value is XmlNodeType.CDATA.
trans-unit.target: Para nós CDATA, o valor é XmlNodeType.CDATA.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of this node (for nodes that can have parents).
trans-unit.target: Obtém o principal deste nó (para nós podem ter elementos principais).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""></xref> that is the parent of the current node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""> </xref> que é o principal do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: If a node has just been created and not yet added to the tree, or if it has been removed from the tree, the parent is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se apenas foi criado um nó e ainda não foram adicionados à árvore, ou se foi removido da árvore de, é o principal <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For all other nodes, the value returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType*> of the node.
trans-unit.target: Para todos os outros nós, o valor devolvido depende o <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType*>do nó.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType*>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible return values for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ParentNode" name="ParentNode" href=""></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte descreve os valores de retorno possíveis para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_ParentNode" name="ParentNode" href=""> </xref> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text node that immediately precedes this node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nó de texto que precede imediatamente neste nó.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves the children of the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Guarda os subordinados do nó especificado <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Because CDATA nodes do not have children, `WriteContentTo` has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Porque o nós CDATA não tem elementos subordinados, `WriteContentTo` não tem qualquer efeito.

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Este método é uma extensão da Microsoft para o documento Object Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> ao qual pretende guardar.

trans-unit.source: Saves the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Guarda o nó especificado <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Este método é uma extensão da Microsoft para o documento Object Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> ao qual pretende guardar.
